meanings.definition: A navigational system using radio signals to determine location.
meanings.sent1: The sailors relied on loran to find their way back to shore.
meanings.sent2: The loran helped the hikers pinpoint their exact position in the wilderness.
meanings.sent3: The lost dog followed the loran signals to reunite with its owner.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition acted as a loran, guiding her through life's uncertainties.
meanings.sent5: The loran beacon shone brightly through the fog, leading the ships to safety.

meanings.definition: To navigate using a loran system.
meanings.sent1: He loraned his way through the dense forest, never losing his path.
meanings.sent2: The experienced captain loraned effortlessly across the open sea.
meanings.sent3: She loraned through the bustling city streets with ease, reaching her destination in no time.
meanings.sent4: Like a skilled pilot, he loraned through life's challenges with precision.
meanings.sent5: The young explorer loraned through the maze, reaching the treasure at its heart.

meanings.definition: The name of a specific type of navigational system.
meanings.sent1: The loran was a groundbreaking invention in the field of navigation.
meanings.sent2: Many ships relied on the loran for accurate positioning at sea.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended their treehouse was a magical loran, guiding them on imaginary adventures.
meanings.sent4: His smile was like a loran, always pointing others in the right direction.
meanings.sent5: The ancient map revealed the location of the hidden loran, rumored to possess great powers.
